author: Ben Green
title: The top 10 football videos of the day: Featuring Diego Costa & Leo Messi
text:
The top 10 football videos of the day: Featuring Diego Costa & Leo Messi By Ben Green   Wow!!!! Jeison Murillo’s stunning goal for Inter Milan v Bologna!!! Jan 17, 2017 at 1:00pm PST Watch Diego Costa back in Chelsea training Training Today : Diego Costa join the group . pic.twitter.com/EroBTTDOH3 Leo Messi humiliates Barcelona teammates in training AC Milan keeper Gianluigi Donnarumma is an absolute beast at saving penalties! A video posted by AC Milan (@acmilan) on Jan 17, 2017 at 2:57am PST Chelsea post video of Pedro’s magic pass for goal at Leicester A video posted by Chelsea FC – Official (@chelseafc) on Jan 17, 2017 at 1:23am PST Kurt Zouma & N’Golo Kante watch Claudio Bravo’s saves of the season video! Kurt Zouma & N'Golo Kante watch Claudio Bravo's saves of the season video pic.twitter.com/XkK75VoFwy 
— 101 Great Goals (@101greatgoals) January 17, 2017 Hugo Lloris save, Dele Alli nuts & Toby Alderweireld long pass A stunning Hugo save, another @Dele_Alli nutmeg and a perfect @AlderweireldTob pass! 
moments you may have missed from West Brom… pic.twitter.com/Ag937GpThw 
— Tottenham Hotspur (@SpursOfficial) January 17, 2017 Louis van Gaal hugs famous foe Rivaldo in Barcelona tribute video Ciro & Jessica Immobile show off their moves Ciro & Jessica Immobile show off their moves pic.twitter.com/MTdJCSsLZt 
— 101 Great Goals (@101greatgoals) January 17, 2017 Real Madrid shooting practice pre Celta Vigo The top 10 best football videos on January 17, 2017 
This is a new feature from 101 Great Goals – we hope you like it! 
These days it can be hard to keep up with everything that is happening on social media and websites across the globe, so we have endeavoured to put together the best clips of the day on one page. 
Today we were entertained with a simply stunning golazo in the Inter Milan game as well as some other great clips, including some big names. 
Enjoy!
